definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Older programs may still have the traditional scroll bar.
sentences.chinese: 其他程序可能仍然有傳統的滾動條。
它看上去像一個簡化的滾動條。

sentences.english: You may need to use the scrollbar located to the right to display this field.
sentences.chinese: 您可能需要使用定位在右邊的滾動條來顯示這個區域。

sentences.english: In my tutorial below, I will explain everything you want to know about scrollbars and more.
sentences.chinese: 在我的教程中，我將解釋一切您想知道滾動條等。

sentences.english: This component allows horizontal and vertical scrollbars to appear and disappear as needed. The results of the Search.byKeyword()
sentences.chinese: 這個組件可以根據需要顯示和隱藏水平和垂直滾動條。

sentences.english: Change the contents of the client area in response to a change in the scroll bar.
sentences.chinese: 改變客戶區的內容以響應滾動條的改變。

sentences.english: You pass in flags to create scroll bars and to tell the text to wrap.
sentences.chinese: 通過傳入標誌，創建滾動條，並告訴文本換行。

sentences.english: Now you have to set the resolution by moving the big slider.
sentences.chinese: 現在您可以拖動較大的那個滾動條開設置分辯率了。

sentences.english: Horizontal and Vertical Scrolling Form E - This is a form with a horizontal and vertical scrollbar.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個窗體，帶有一個水平和垂直的滾動條。

sentences.english: At first, the design team found it very difficult to get the scrollbar details true.
sentences.chinese: 一開始，設計小組發現很難把滾動條的細節弄得真實。

sentences.english: For more on scrollbars, see Chapter 21.
sentences.chinese: 關於滾動條的更多信息參見第21章。

sentences.english: That is how I first came to take an interest inthe message of the tape.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我如何第一次對滾動條信息感興趣。

sentences.english: Forces the user to use the right-left scroll bar to read the text.
sentences.chinese: 用戶需要利用水平滾動條閱讀文本。

sentences.english: This label is updated each time the user clicks on the scrollbar.
sentences.chinese: 每當用戶單擊滾動條，這個標籤就會更新。

sentences.english: Use the scroll bar to locate the desired record type.
sentences.chinese: 利用這個滾動條來確定想要的記錄類型。

sentences.english: Updated horizontal scrollbars visible on Competition Tree view.
sentences.chinese: 更新的水平滾動條有形競爭樹的看法。
